Header: Moscow plane fire: 41 killed on Aeroflot jet
Content: Forty-one people were killed after a Russian plane made an emergency landing and burst into flames at Sheremetyevo airport in Moscow. Videos on social media show passengers using emergency exit slides to escape the burning Aeroflot aircraft. Two children and a flight attendant were among the dead. One witness said it was a “miracle” anyone escaped the jet, which was carrying 73 passengers and five crew. There are 37 survivors – 33 passengers and four members of the crew. Five people are in hospital. Some flights have been diverted to other airports.
